org.apache.james.smtpserver.fastfail

Class JDBCGreylistHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.protocols.smtp.core.fastfail.AbstractGreylistHandler
      • org.apache.james.smtpserver.fastfail.JDBCGreylistHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.james.protocols.api.handler.LifecycleAwareProtocolHandler, org.apache.james.protocols.api.handler.ProtocolHandler, InitializingLifecycleAwareProtocolHandler, org.apache.james.protocols.smtp.hook.Hook, org.apache.james.protocols.smtp.hook.RcptHook

    public class JDBCGreylistHandler
extends org.apache.james.protocols.smtp.core.fastfail.AbstractGreylistHandler
implements InitializingLifecycleAwareProtocolHandler
    GreylistHandler which can be used to activate Greylisting

        public void setAutoWhiteListLifeTime(String autoWhiteListLifeTime)
